Class Jps

    public class Jps
extends Object
implements PrintConstants
    Routines related to the Inq interface to the Java print service

      • getDefaultPrinter

        public static Map getDefaultPrinter()
        Return the default print service or null if none found.
        Returns:
        A map describing the default print service or null if none is determined by jps.

      • getPrintableArea

        public static Any getPrintableArea(Any mediaSize,
                                   Any margins)
        Determine the printable area given the media size name and the margins.
        Parameters:
        mediaSize - an AnyEnumSyntax object containing the media size name
        an - array containing AnyFloat values for the margins in the order left, right, top, bottom in units of millimetres
